name: Beyond the Sky
description: Help Selene escape from a mysterious dark forest and defeat her fears in an exciting and powerful point and click adventure that will test your wits with difficult but logical puzzles seamlessly integrated into the story.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 64bit Processor: 1 GHz CPU Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Dedicated video card DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 64bit Processor: Intel 6th generation or equivalent Memory: 2 MB RAM Graphics: 2GB video card
